title: sarOjaakSa raamaa (varaNam)
sahitya:
sarOjAkSa rAma ninnE kOri cAla namminAnurA

anupallavi

 parAkEla jEsEvu dEvA parama pAvana rAmacandrapura vAsa

ciTTasvara sAhitya

sadayuDavani ninu mudamuna satatamu madini dalaci vara padamulu gatiyani 
vataracunu dinamugatalu sup[avamanu nidhi nitakulu paDiyatari pedarucunu

caraNam

 pAmaruDa nanu karuNa jUDavayyA rAmaiyyA rAma
